ygData.subject: Phobia in command? Cyberwolf is flattered.

Phobia was shocked at the results of the voting, but he above all else knew
the rules of leadership. number 1 take charge of the situation at hand.

"I appreciate your confidence in me. First things firs, KitKat's hurt bad
and we have two options, What's closer, the predacon ship or the alliance
base?" The spiderbot knew that the first priority of the group was to assure
the leaders survival.

Number 2 apraise the groups strengths.

"GoldenEye get airborn and make sure we weren't spotted." He knew sending
Starscream would be to dangerous with his possible injuries and Bludgeon
covered his own tail when the going got dangerousand would do so again when
the situation arised.

Number 3 keep potential backstabbers in front of you. "Bludgeon  I need your
artilary at the point, if we encounter trouble I want the strongest bot on
the front lines.

Number 4 take advantage of your groups weaknesses.

"Drillbit, keep an eye on KitKats life signs, if she shows any change for
the worse let me know immediately."

Number 5 exagerate weaknesses into strengths.

"Starscream, I know your reputation don't even think you can manipulate me,
Psychological Warfares what I was created for.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2000 4:54 PM
Subject: The Acting Pred Commander


>
> ::Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
>
> Reptilica turns to Phobia as he hears all the votes. Finally, he knew who
to
> talk to!
>
> "Allright," he says, "Now that you're commander, do you want our help or
not?"
>
>
